content: the http://hl7-fhir.github.io/codesystem.html#tabs-uml UML resource diagram is a bit of a mess .. could it be fixed for inclusion in a tutorial ?

@René Spronk if you just want to make a decent screenshot and you can't wait for the official build update, then you could temporarily fix the UML diagram layout using the Web Developer toolbar in the web browser. Manually change the {x,y} coordinates of a component and the diagram will be updated on the fly.

Hmmm .. I see how that could be done. If I needed it that quickly I'd probably use a bitmap editor (for me, editing that way would be faster). I just hope it can be fixed within the next week, or I'll really be forced to do just that.
Feel free to go into the source and adjust it yourself :)

You do assume familiarity with the publication process - which won't be true for "80%" of the participants on this site.. I for one am happy to leave that stuff to others, even when it's simpler than the v3 pubs process.
Typically I sweep through the diagrams and tidy them up in the lead in to ballot
@René Spronk I wasn't assuming familiarity for everyone. But knowing you, it's probably something you could (and perhaps should, if you haven't done it before) take on.
Hi Rene, I have updated both ValueSet and CodeSystem to improve the rendering.
